n: Honey Carrots With a Hint of Ginger
des: "Baby carrots are simmered in a buttery ginger sauce sweetened with honey. A great accompaniment to a chicken dinner."
ins: Combine the butter, honey, ginger and lemon juice in a large pot. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Add carrots and reduce heat to medium. Cover and simmer for about 10 minutes, or until carrots are tender. Simmer longer if you desire more tender carrots.
